subject: [lion.net.au] lion.net.au: AutoSSL reduced SSL coverage

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
lion.net.au: AutoSSL reduced SSL coverage

AutoSSL has successfully renewed the Domain Validated (DV) SSL certificate
for “lion.net.au”. The new certificate lacks the following domains that the
previous certificate secured:

*⛔ mail.lion.net.au <http://mail.lion.net.au>* (checked on Apr 3, 2025 at
4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “mail.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV:
“mail.lion.net.au” does not resolve to any IP addresses on the
internet.

*⛔ cpanel.lion.net.au <http://cpanel.lion.net.au>* (checked on Apr 3, 2025
at 4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “cpanel.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV:
“cpanel.lion.net.au” does not resolve to any IP addresses on the
internet.

*⛔ webmail.lion.net.au <http://webmail.lion.net.au>* (checked on Apr 3,
2025 at 4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “webmail.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV: The
system queried for a temporary file at
“http://webmail.lion.net.au/.well-known/acme-challenge/IRNRWH781E0BVBA6IN1KRC777_H-4KW8”,
but the web server responded with the following error: 404 (Not
Found). A DNS (Domain Name System) or web server misconfiguration may
exist. The domain “webmail.lion.net.au” resolved to an IP address
“202.124.241.208” that does not exist on this server.

*⛔ webdisk.lion.net.au <http://webdisk.lion.net.au>* (checked on Apr 3,
2025 at 4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “webdisk.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV:
“webdisk.lion.net.au” does not resolve to any IP addresses on the
internet.

*⛔ cpcontacts.lion.net.au <http://cpcontacts.lion.net.au>* (checked on Apr
3, 2025 at 4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “cpcontacts.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV:
“cpcontacts.lion.net.au” does not resolve to any IP addresses on the
internet.

*⛔ cpcalendars.lion.net.au <http://cpcalendars.lion.net.au>* (checked on
Apr 3, 2025 at 4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “cpcalendars.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV:
“cpcalendars.lion.net.au” does not resolve to any IP addresses on the
internet.

*⛔ autodiscover.lion.net.au <http://autodiscover.lion.net.au>* (checked on
Apr 3, 2025 at 4:59:56 AM UTC)

DNS DCV: No local authority: “autodiscover.lion.net.au”; HTTP DCV: The
system queried for a temporary file at
“http://autodiscover.lion.net.au/.well-known/acme-challenge/Y8P47N2KZQ6D03T9T8L9IFCM0B4CFFW2”,
but the web server responded with the following error: 403
(Forbidden). A DNS (Domain Name System) or web server misconfiguration
may exist. The domain “autodiscover.lion.net.au” resolved to an IP
address “2603:1016:0401:2c15:0000:0000:0000:0008” that does not exist
on this server.

If these domains do not need valid SSL, then you do not need to take any
further action. However, if you want AutoSSL to secure these domains, you
must resolve the above problems.

The certificate is now active on the website for the following domain
names:

- lion.net.au
- www.lion.net.au
- autodiscover.lion.net.au ⛔
- cpanel.lion.net.au ⛔
- cpcalendars.lion.net.au ⛔
- cpcontacts.lion.net.au ⛔
- mail.lion.net.au ⛔
- webdisk.lion.net.au ⛔
- webmail.lion.net.au ⛔

NOTE: “⛔” marks domains that the newly-installed certificate does not
include or secure. Visitors who access these domain names will see web
browser security warnings.
The certificate has the following properties:
Expiration: Wednesday, July 2, 2025 at 4:01:26 AM UTC
Domain Names:
lion.net.au
www.lion.net.au
Subject:
commonName www.lion.net.au
Issuer:
countryName US
organizationName Let's Encrypt
commonName R10

The certificate’s PEM representation is attached to this message.

Navigate to the “SSL/TLS Manager
<https://lion.net.au:2083/?goto_app=SSL_TLS_Manager>” interface if you
require the private key for this certificate. The key ID for the private
key is “cf627_7fd83_ac7e47267b579a461ab7ae1abe8014ad”.

The system generated this notice on Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 5:00:03 AM
UTC.

You can disable the “AutoSSL has renewed a certificate, but the new
certificate lacks at least one domain that the previous certificate
secured.” type of notification through the cPanel interface:
https://lion.net.au:2083/?goto_app=ContactInfo_Change

Do not reply to this automated message.
